thread.section_title: Saatchi Art Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Saatchi Art | saatchiart.com
thread.title: Risa

author: Risa
title: Risa
text: I have fallen in love with the Saatchi Art Gallery! I bought 2 gorgeous pieces of art. One was perfect for my space but another just didn't work. I could not return it during the dedicated time period as I was out of the country and the support team worked with me to make it easy as possible to work around my busy NYC schedule. The result: I just purchased 3 more pieces which I look forward to having in my home!
